This page is automatically generated by the data_page_generator.rb plugin, based on the _layouts/job.html template.

Use the _config.yml to specify the rules for generating pages like this one (including name and template).

In the template, you have access to all the fields defined in data for the record, like, for instance:

Date,Company,Location,Title,Summary,Responsibilities,Skills,Min_Qualifications,Preferred_Qualifications

  • 8/6/2014
  • PetsMart
  • CA - Canoga Park
  • Innovation & Interaction Designer
  • The Innovation Designer role is for a visionary artist who can create illustrative concepts from broad ranging concepts. This position will be a member of the innovation team and will visualize concepts in an iterative design approach. These concepts will be represented from storyboard format to wireframe to mockup (low-res, hi-res) to prototype design. The goal of the innovation designer is to enable the product owner to get a visual sense of what is being proposed early in the process and on a regular basis. The designer will stay one (1) sprint cycle ahead of the developers so that visual and functional concepts can be refined prior to coding. Functional mock-ups are a valuable tool that this position will create.
Additionally, you also have access to page.name, which is the filename of the page, that is: index.html.
